text: Eyes on You is the eighth extended play by South Korean boy band Got7. It was released by JYP Entertainment and iriver Inc on March 12, 2018. Like their other albums, the members also participated in co-writing and co-producing the songs with the help of other producers including Mirror BOY, D.ham, Munhan Mirror. It contains seven songs, including the singles "Look" and "One and Only You" featuring Hyolyn. == Track listing == ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2018) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| French Download Albums (SNEP) |62 |- ! scope="row"| NZ Heatseeker Albums (RMNZ) | 4 |- ! scope="row"| South Korean Albums (Gaon) | 1 |- ! scope="row"| United Kingdom Download (OCC) |43 |- ! scope="row"| US World Albums (Billboard) | 2 |- ! scope="row"| US Heatseekers Albums (Billboard) | 2 |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2018) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| South Korean Albums (Gaon) | 12 |} ===Singles=== "Look" {| class="wikitable" ! scope="col"| Chart ! scope="col"| Peak position |- | Gaon Singles chart | align="center"| 15 |} "One and Only You" {| class="wikitable" ! scope="col"| Chart ! scope="col"| Peak position |- | Gaon Singles chart | align="center"| 76 |} ==Certifications== ==Awards== ===Music programs=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! width="140"| Song ! width="200"| Program ! width="140"| Date ! |- | "Look" | Music Bank (KBS) | March 23, 2018 | |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" !
